name: LOASM
description:
I need Spacemarines for my fangame (I would like to be able to show a full Chapter on screen (which is one reason I made the SMs all flat and super low poly) , so this is a little "life of a space marine" project that will eventually get merged into "Victory Exterminatus Extremis"... 

https://derrickmoore.itch.io/journey-to-terra-an-unofficial-40k-fangame

and Discord server https://discord.gg/SnGsKVg

Day 3 working on buttons.. so Player can move between areas.. right now just set to the Marine's Cell and a Planetary hellscape... Gonna make a few areas on the Ship the Player can visit, and make a simple "battle scenario"

Day 2...     just a test,.. nothing to see.... someone else should upload the project
